law.text: Any officer, agent, or employee of the Finance and Administration Cabinet who willfully fails or refuses to comply with any of the provisions of KRS 45.131 is subject to indictment in the Franklin Circuit Court and, upon conviction shall be fined not less than fifty dollars ($50) nor more than five hundred dollars ($500) for each offense.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted as KRS 45.991, 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 36, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. II, sec. 9(1). -- Repealed and reenacted 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 18. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 126, sec. 2; and ch. 255, sec. 283. -- Amended 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 16, sec. 8; and ch. 178, sec. 2. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 187, sec. 5. -- Amended 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 122, secs. 1, 2, 3, and 4. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 1992b-63, 3990-22.
